extendedIngredients.name: chives
extendedIngredients.original: 1 tablespoon minced chives, plus 3 tablespoons chives cut in 1-inch lengths
extendedIngredients.originalName: minced chives, plus 3 tablespoons chives cut in 1-inch lengths

extendedIngredients.name: goat cheese
extendedIngredients.original: 4 1/2 ounces fresh goat cheese (3/4 cup), softened

title: Beet-and-Goat Cheese "Ravioli
summary: The recipe Beet-and-Goat Cheese "Ravioli could satisfy your Mediterranean craving in roughly 1 hour and 30 minutes. This recipe makes 8 servings with 244 calories, 6g of protein, and 19g of fat each. For $1.61 per serving, this recipe covers 8% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. 1 person has made this recipe and would make it again. If you have soy sauce, chives, goat cheese, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. Not a lot of people really liked this side dish. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free and vegetarian diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 39%. This score is not so spectacular. Try Honey Goat Cheese Beet “Ravioli”, Beet Ravioli Stuffed With Ricotta, Goat Cheese, And Mint, and Beet Ravioli with Pine Nut "Goat Cheese" Rosemary-Cream Sauce, Aged Balsamic Vinegar for similar recipes.
instructions: In a large saucepan, cover the beets with water and bring to a boil. Simmer the beets over moderate heat until tender, about 1 hour. Drain and let cool. Peel the beets and slice them crosswise 1/4 inch thick; you'll need 64 slices.                                              In a small bowl, blend the goat cheese with the minced chives and season with salt and pepper. Arrange 32 beet rounds on a work surface. Dollop a teaspoon of the goat cheese in the center of each round and top with the remaining 32 rounds; press lightly. Transfer the beet ravioli to plates or a platter.                                              In a small bowl, combine the sugar, vinegar and soy sauce and stir to dissolve the sugar. Spoon the dressing over the ravioli and drizzle with olive oil. Garnish with the chives and serve.

steps.step: In a large saucepan, cover the beets with water and bring to a boil. Simmer the beets over moderate heat until tender, about 1 hour.
Drain and let cool. Peel the beets and slice them crosswise 1/4 inch thick; you'll need 64 slices.

In a small bowl, blend the goat cheese with the minced chives and season with salt and pepper. Arrange 32 beet rounds on a work surface. Dollop a teaspoon of the goat cheese in the center of each round and top with the remaining 32 rounds; press lightly.
Transfer the beet ravioli to plates or a platter.
In a small bowl, combine the sugar, vinegar and soy sauce and stir to dissolve the sugar. Spoon the dressing over the ravioli and drizzle with olive oil.
Garnish with the chives and serve.
